title: Do all universities in New Zealand need international students to end their first year of university in their home country? - Quora
tags: Universities and Colleges in New Zealand

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A. No, international fee paying student visas usually last for four years, the duration of a bachelor degree.[1] However most students return home for the summer break between November and early February to be with their families and because their contracts with their landlords and university accommodation providers ends around that time. Some international students do however stay for research and work purposes since student visas allow them to work for 20 hours part time during the semester and full time during the summer break. Hope this helps. Footnotes[1] Information about : Fee Paying Student Visa
